name: Enlarged Dragon Breath
benefit: When you use the dragon breath power, you can choose to make it blast 5 instead of blast 3

name: Avandra’s Rescue [Divinity]
benefit: You can invoke the power of your deity to use Avandra’s rescue.

abil_granted.name: Channel Divinity: Avandra’s Rescue
abil_granted.special: You must take the Avandra’s Rescue feat to use this power.
abil_granted.effect: Shift into the space of an adjacent ally; that ally simultaneously shifts into your space. Your space and your ally’s space must be the same size.

name: Backstabber [Rogue]
special: The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6s to d8s

name: Blade Opportunist
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to opportunity attack rolls with a heavy blade or a light blade.

name: Burning Blizzard
benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the acid or the cold keyword.
special: At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

name: Combat Reflexes
benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to opportunity attack rolls.

name: Corellon’s Grace [Divinity]
benefit: You can invoke the power of your deity to use Corellon’s grace.

abil_granted.name: Channel Divinity: Corellon’s Grace
abil_granted.special: You must take the Corellon's Grace feat to use this power.  Trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you spends an action point to take an extra action

name: Dark Fury
benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the necrotic or the psychic keyword.
special: At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

name: Defensive Mobility
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

name: Distracting Shield [Fighter]
benefit: If you hit a foe with an attack granted by your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
special: You must have a shield equipped to benefit from this feat.

name: Dodge Giants [Dwarf]
benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex defense against the attacks of Large or larger foes.

name: Dragonborn Frenzy [Dragonborn]
benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

name: Dragonborn Senses [Dragonborn]
benefit: You gain low-light vision. You also gain a +1 feat bonus to Perception checks.

name: Durable
benefit: Increase your number of healing surges by two.

name: Dwarven Weapon Training [Dwarf]
benefit: You gain proficiency and a +2 feat bonus to damage rolls with axes and hammers.
